name: Zdomotic
tagline: Trying to automate stuffs in my home
body:
# zDomotic
Or How I'm trying to automate things at my place.

## Part 1: Introduction and motivation
This whole project started as I began renovating my flat : due to money concerns, the lady and myself opted for an electrical heating system. With that in mind, I easily convinced myself I'd have to invest in good heaters and watch closely their consumption.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
